headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  VANACORE, FREDRICK THOMAS

snippet: VANACORE--Fredrick Thomas, of Mendham, NJ. Memorial gathering June 25, 2016, at the Ralston Firehouse Mendham from 12:00-3:00pm with a service at 1:00pm. A celebration of his life will take place on August 6 at the Adirondack Hotel in Long Lake, NY. Donations in his memory may be made to the Ralston Engine Co. No. 1 in Mendham, NJ and to the Long Lake Public Library in Long Lake, NY. www.baileyfh.com. 1/3
